Detailed Description

topology of conjugated segments and rigid fragments

contains rigid fragments (centers of mass and orientations). Given a CG toplogy, it adds orientations to CG beads onto and updates positions of rigid fragments. Crg units should be associated to these qm beads and not to any other.
